description:
This course is for entrepreneurial yoga teachers who dream of their teachings reaching students on an international level. And, by the completion of this course, you will understand exactly what it takes to turn your yoga teaching "hobby" into a fun, fulfilling and sustainable career.

Consisting of videos, action sheets, comprehension questions and other valuable resources, this online program delves into the various aspects of creating an online yoga business to supplement your local teaching.

Together, we'll cover...

  • How to Create Your 1st Online Offering
  • How to fill your BIG programs
  • Branding Your Yoga Biz from the Inside Out with guest-lecturer Francesca Cervero
  • How to monetize your yoga blog
  • 35 ways to grow your biz (without working more hours)
  • How to open a virtual yoga studio
  • Go from LOCAL teacher to GLOBAL entrepreneur
title: Go From LOCAL Teacher to GLOBAL Yoga Entrepreneur
